title: Prediction Prompt Interface
description: An annotated mockup demonstrating best practices for designing prediction prompt interfaces in educational MicroSims. Shows the 5-panel workflow: Setup, Prediction Input, Reasoning Capture, Observation, and Reflection. Teaches instructional designers how to effectively capture learner predictions before observations to maximize engagement and learning.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: prediction prompts

audience: Instructional designers, educators, curriculum developers, educational technology specialists
